messages.content:
The user asked you to create the source code with the following specification:
```
<REQUEST>
<goal>show the data from `simpleValue2`</goal>

<description>Show the data from the `simpleValue2` charm, displaying its current value and any associated metadata.</description>
</REQUEST>
<PLAN>1. Create a component that reads data from the existing simplevalue2.values array
2. Implement the display logic to render each string value as a list item
3. Add a metadata section showing the total count of values</PLAN>
<SPEC>The SimpleValue2 Viewer will display all strings contained in the "values" array of the simplevalue2 object. It will show each value as a list item and include a count of total values as metadata. The viewer will be read-only and automatically update when the underlying data changes.</SPEC>
```
